Fighters.Name: Houdini
Fighters.Text:
ESCAPE ARTIST
When you take the maneuver action and BOOST, you may place Houdini in any space instead of moving. (Bess moves as normal.)

Fighters.Name: Bess
Fighters.Text:
ESCAPE ARTIST
When you take the maneuver action and BOOST, you may place Houdini in any space instead of moving. (Bess moves as normal.)

Card.Name: Vanishing Act
Card.Text: After combat: Choose one of the fighters in the combat and move them up to 3 spaces. They may move through their opposing fighters.

Card.Name: The Big Reveal
Card.Text:
During combat: You may BOOST this card twice.
After combat: Return one card you boosted with to your hand.

Card.Name: Smoke and Mirrors
Card.Text: Immediately: Houdini and Bess may swap spaces. If they do, your other fighter is now in the combat.

Card.Name: Sleight of Hand
Card.Text:
BOOSTED WITH: Draw 1 card.
Immediately: You may return this card to your hand and choose a different card to play. Resolve all effects on that card as normal.

Card.Name: Set the Stage
Card.Text:
Draw 3 cards. Then, put a card in your hand on top of your deck.
BOOSTED WITH: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card for them to discard.

Card.Name: Misdirection
Card.Text:
BOOSTED WITH: Deal 2 damage to any fighter.
Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

Card.Name: Grand Escape
Card.Text:
During combat: You may BOOST this card.
After combat: If you won the combat, place your fighter in any space.

Card.Name: Flourish
Card.Text:
BOOSTED WITH: Draw 1 card.
During combat: You may BOOST this card.

Card.Name: An Illusion of My Own Design
Card.Key: Harry Houdini_An Illusion of My Own Design
Card.Text:
Immediately: Your opponent may BOOST their card.
During combat: You may BOOST this card.
Card.Script: ../Harry Houdini/An Illusion of My Own Design.lua

Card.Name: All Part of the Show
Card.Key: Harry Houdini_All Part of the Show
Card.Text:
This card's effect cannot be canceled.
BOOSTED WITH: Houdini recovers 2 health.
After combat: If your fighter was defeated, set their health to 4 instead and place them in any space. (This effect happens even if Houdini was defeated.)

Card.Name: A Magician Never Reveals His Secrets
Card.Key: Harry Houdini_A Magician Never Reveals His Secrets
Card.Text:
Draw 2 cards. Gain 1 action.
If an effect would let an opponent look at your hand, you may reveal this card and cancel that effect.
Card.Script: ../Harry Houdini/A Magician Never Reveals His Secrets.lua

Card.Name: For My Next Trick
Card.Text: After combat: Move one of your fighters up to 1 space. Draw 1 card. Gain 1 action.

Card.Name: And the Beautiful Bess!
Card.Text:
If you discard this card as a result of an opponent's effect, draw 1 card.
BOOSTED WITH: If it's your turn, gain 1 action.
